meta_info.name: ATTESTATION
meta_info.description: Record an attestation of a party (the committer) to item(s) of record content. An attestation is an explicit signing by one healthcare agent of particular content for various particular purposes, including:

attributes.name: attested_view
attributes.description: Optional visual representation of content attested e.g. screen image.

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Items attested, expressed as fully qualified runtime paths to the items in question. Although not recommended, these may include fine-grained items which have been attested in some other system. Otherwise it is assumed to be for the entire VERSION with which it is associated.

attributes.name: reason
attributes.description: Reason of this attestation. Optionally coded by the openEHR Terminology group  attestation reason ; includes values like  authorisation ,  witness  etc.

attributes.name: is_pending
attributes.description: True if this attestation is outstanding; False means it has been completed.
